subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Steroids
Tests and Testing
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Italian fans ran around draped in their national colors at the start of the Fleche Wallonne classic in Belgium, looking for Ivan Basso’s bicycle beside the Discovery Channel bus. It was nowhere in sight, nor was their national star.
snippet: Italian fans ran around draped in their national colors at the start of the Fleche Wallonne classic in Belgium, looking for Ivan Basso’s bicycle beside the Discovery Channel bus. It was nowhere in sight, nor was their national star.
